name: Manual Brewing 101 Workshop
description:
Ace the art of manual brewing with this workshop!  
In this carefully curated session, Blue Tokai’s in-house trainers will take you through the basics of brewing coffee at home, as well as the science behind pouring the perfect cup, everytime! Our team will demonstrate 4 manual brewing methods during the workshop - French Press, AeroPress, Pour Over and Channi.  
Whether you’re a beginner or an expert brewer, sign up for this workshop and join our community of coffee lovers!
Date: 27th April 2025 (Sunday)Time: 11 AM - 1 PM Location: 
Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters, Oshiwara, Mumbai
Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters, Sadashiva Nagar, Bengaluru
Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters, Panchsheel Park
Please Note: Tickets for this event are non-refundable and cannot be transferred to future events.
